product.name: Echelon Home Three Line Hotel Collection Euro Shams Pair, White
product.description: Echelon three line hotel collection Euro shams offer the classic "hotel" look that has become a must-have for chic bedrooms everywhere, at an affordable price! they are made with soft 100Percent cotton, 300 thread count sateen weave enhanced with embroidery in either: white, ivory, navy, silver blue, light grey or Black. The euro shams have narrow flanges and are sold in pairs.
product.bullet_points:
• 100% Cotton
• Imported
• 100% cotton sateen weave, 300 thread count single ply made with 60s yarns
• Set Of 2 Euro Shams (26 X 26 In.)
• Shams Have Narrow Flanges And Backside Envelope Closure
• Machine Wash And Dry
